newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle near standstill - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle near standstill - USDA.

text.p: Trade at a near standstill in the panhandle area Thursday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers not well tested. Feedlots reporting light inquiry.

Sales reported on 100 slaughter heifers; 155,100 head confirmed for week to date which includes 20,900 formulated cattle and 1,300 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week and 44 loads or 1,500 CME cattle.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Heifers - Pen Select and Choice 2-3 1100 lbs 68.00.
Confirmed - 100 Week Ago - None Year Ago - 25,000
Wk to Date - 155,100 Week Ago - 54,700 Year Ago - 73,300
